mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_story ( st_title, st_img, st_time, user_id, st_desc, play_count, comment_count, share_count, collect_count, st_href, pub_time, x_state, al_id ) VALUES (#{st_title},#{stImg},#{stTime},#{userId},#{stDesc},#{playCount},#{commentCount},#{shareCount},#{collectCount},#{stHref},#{pubTime},#{xState},#{alId})
